sentence.text: The aims of the present study were to evaluate the relation of dysregulated positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, c-MET, and positive regulation of DNA binding-negative regulation of cell migration expression with the histopathological features of tumors in recurrence formation in eCC cases.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The relationship between the altered expression of positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, c-endothelial cell morphogenesis, and positive regulation of DNA binding-negative regulation of cell migration and pathological microenvironmental features, including the presence of tumor budding and desmoplasia, were assessed.

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: In addition, the coexistence of high positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II and low NM23-negative regulation of cell migration expression and tumor budding was associated with short OS (p AAAA 0.001).

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: We suggest that the combination of reduced positive regulation of DNA binding-negative regulation of cell migration, induced positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, and the presence of tumor budding are promising biomarkers for the prediction of recurrence and may aid the stratification of patients with stage II colon cancer for adjuvant chemotherapy

entity.text: positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II

sentence.text: The aims of the present study were to evaluate the relation of dysregulated MACC1, c-endothelial cell morphogenesis, and NM23-H1 expression with the histopathological features of tumors in recurrence formation in eCC cases.

We suggest that the combination of reduced NM23-H1, induced positive regulation of transcription by RNA polymerase II, and the presence of tumor budding are promising biomarkers for the prediction of recurrence and may aid the stratification of patients with stage II colon cancer for adjuvant chemotherapy
